text: ohu pawasuye aatha hadda pitisara polathu palaka ipida danumin lokaya pubudu karannata sanchitha sakyathawen yuthu dugi duppath daruwanata da ee sandaha awasthawa nidahas adhyapanaya magin udawana bawaki.

thama sama wayase siti “sindu raja” ali patawa rajuge hondama mithura wiya.mese kalaya gewi giya athara dinak maligawe niladharin samanga diyawadana nilame mahatha nilanga dala mahatha athuru sewanata paminiye maligawe athpanthiya sandaha sudussan thora ganimataya.ohuge therimata anuwa idiri anagathaye di rate uththaritharama sthanaye mangala hasthiya wimata awashya sudusukam labime wasanawa me patawun dedenagen ek ayakuta wasanawa labenna puluwaniya yana wishwasaya matha malwathu ha asgiri deparshwayata 2009-7-27 wana dina puja karana ladi.kalayage awamen wasara 8k sampurna karana me gaja ilandharin dedena atharin “raju” kramayen thama parinathabhawaya oppu kirimata patangena atha.thawamath athpanthiye dangakaraya wu raju adi atak pamana usin da manawa wadena dala yugalakin da thama dehayata abhimanaya ragena mangala hasthi rajayakuta awashya wana pradhana sudusukam wana shariraye sthana hatharak bima sparshawima enam hondawala, pada hathara, lingendriya saha waligaya wana athara dala yugala, palal wata, palala kumbaathala ha udara lilawa me yana sudusukamwalin poshanaya wana hasthiya mangala hasthirajayeku lesath shri dalada wahanse wadama karawimata sudusukam athi ayeku lesa salake.raju ilandari atha ihatha sudusukam sapuralamin thama hakiyawa pradarshanaya kirimata patangena atha.

ema godanangilla wenuwen rajaye mudal me aakarayen wiyadam kirima kotharam yukthi yuktha dayi wiganakadhipathiwarayada, krushikarma amathyanshaye lekamwarayagen pasugiya mayi masayedi wimasa thibini.

sthuthiyi ayiye awith giyata.~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~chapa akka : owu owu matath kiyanna thiyanne oyalage sadde damillata jaya wewa kiyala thama.aayeth ahala.oya oonayiyalata,dumi ayiyalata ehema obama sadde danne liyapalla kiyala.eeta passene eyala liyanne.mewa bayata liyawena post.hik hik.~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~thanoja nanda : meka aththa kathawa.mama eda indanma me tika tika liyanne ee kathawa.gothapu kathawak wage neda?eeth meka thamayi aththa.aaye kattiya hamba una welawaka me liyaddi amathaka una than ekkama kiyannamko ehenam.
ganu kiyanne malliye nogawenu kiyala kawiyak thiyanawa

merata krushikarmanthaya saha gowi’ janathawa nangasituwima wenuwen pilip gunawardhanayan eda idiripath kala kumbauru panatha hethuwen nuthana krushikarmaye prabodhayak athiwu bawada adhirajyawadi yugayata pera rate thibu swayanposhitha aarthika kramayata apa nawatha gamankala yuthu bawada aarthika sanwardhana amathi basil rajapaksha mahatha pawasiya.kumbauru panatha wani janathawadi panathak sammathawi eya adiyarin adiyara kriyathmaka kirimedi mulinma kriyawata nanguwe hambanthota disthrikkaye rajapakshawarunge nayakathwayen bawada giruwaye rajapakshawarunta mahajana eksath peramuna samanga loku sambandhayak eda sita thibu bawada amathi basil rajapaksha mahatha wadiduratath pawasiya.aarthika sanwardhana amathi basil rajapaksha mahatha me bawa kiya sitiye diwangatha pilip gunawardhanayange 112wani janma dinaya wenuwen padukka siri piyarathana madhya mahawidyalaye pawathi sithawaka abhimana 2013 aithihasika, sanskruthika saha aadhyapanika pradarshanayata samagamiwa ikuthda pawathi sithawaka abimana sammana pradana uthsawaye pradhana amuththa washayen sahabhagi wemini.sithawaka urumaya padanama mangin thedinak pura pawathwu me pradarshanayata wishala pirisak sahabhagiwu athara sithawaka pradeshaye samaja, aarthika saha adhyapana sewawan sidu kala pudgalayan wetha sammana pirinamimada basil rajapaksha amathiwaraya athin mehidi siduwiya.
